comments:
We are trying to use BIRT as a reporting tool in our application.
When I try to implement any JavaScript in my report I get the error as "Error in execution of JavaScript" . Can U give the solution for it ?.

There are errors on the report page: 
+ There are error(s) in report : report 
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

can you attach the report design XML file?

The stack shows that you are calling Javascript function "alert". This function is not available in "server-side" Javascript. To see what's available in the BIRT Javascript runtime environment, check the ECMAScript spec in the following link

http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/Ecma-262.pdf

Or the Rhino engine (ECMAScript implementation used by BIRT) web site
http://www.mozilla.org/rhino/doc.html
